name: Low Grav Racer 2
description:
Faad Gold App introduces Low Grav Racer 2 as today's free App.

What the reviews say;

"I consider Low Grav Racer 2 to be one of the stronger racing games in the App Store", TouchArcade.

"The races are fun and provide the most challenge of any racing game in the App Store", AppAdvice.

The instantly playable arcade racer is back and this time it's Bigger, Better and Faster. Already downloaded over half a million times, get the Awesome Racer Now.

In Low Grav Racer 2 you race across 18 planet and space system based tracks from the Dante Nebula to the Arkonian Rift.

Low Grav Racer 2 combines intense high speed racing and shoot-em-up action to create a unique handheld experience, only on the iPhone and iPod Touch.

Designed specifically for iPhone and iPod Touch, Low Grav Racer 2 perfectly combines the Touch, Tilt and Accelerometer features of the iPhone with stunning visuals and heart pounding action to give you one of the finest all round racing and action experiences on the iPhone.

Plus+ enabled; add friends, access Leaderboards, earn Plus+ awards.

Featuring:
● Awesome 3D graphics.
● Single play or Time Trial.
● Blisteringly fast and super smooth game-play.
● 18 All New original tracks to race.
● 6 Ships to race and 3 Race Classes.
● Omega Mines and Speed Boosts.
● Barrel Beams and Time Warps.
● Alpha Missiles, Trident Missiles & Shields.
● Custom soundtracks & 3D spatial sound.
● Plus+ awards and Leaderboards.

See Low Grav Racer 2 in action at www.lowgravracer.com and see other great Cobra games in action at - www.youtube.com/cobimobi

Follow Cobra Mobile on Twitter @cobramobile

Check out Cobra Mobile's other fantastic iOS games including, iBomber, iBomber Defense, Numba, Storm in a Teacup, Powerslide Penguin, Mouse About and Low Grav Racer.
